name: 6 Kings - King Adofo
description:
The battle was hard fought. Rivers and lakes ran seas of red. He has lost men. Lost so much more than partial sight. The wounds heal slowly but the memories flash each night.
The cries and the screams now encoded into his soul.
His sword bent.
His ribs broken. 
His adoration from his tribal brothers and sisters has never been stronger but he cares not.
He no longer understands the reason for war.
He has seen sons of men younger than him lose their lives.
He can no longer explain but he is decorated a hero. 
An adorned King.
